Controls

Up and Down arrows to move

Enter to confirm actions on the menus

+ and - to change volume

Credits and Info

Published on Newgrounds and Itch.io

Car Trip had originally born on April but the game started to get focused on May. Due to school and other stuff HENOOB was on, the game had 3-4 months of development
